page.title: 13Local Industry
page.content: Gould and Co.Ltd.are precast and in_situ concrete manufacturers and contractors.Mr.Gasson works for the firm as a steel fixer;he makes reinforced concrete for large buildings and floor. He is part of a {workforce of 30,7}of whom are{in {the office}and{23}engaged on the production of the concrete units.The site occupies 7 acres and includes the {main casting shed}and several smaller buildings for the making of{moulds and {steel reinforcing cages. { }Mr.Gasson uses a variety of machinery in his work including tractors, dumpers, electronic cutters and benders, cement mixers and power saws.{His work is dangerous}and he needs to wear heavy duty boots, gloves and a safety helmet. {* * * * * * * * *
